short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color code meets weeks numbers. Gray represents the past, Red the current, Orange the next two, and Green the weeks after.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The division of a year into calendar weeks allows the quick assignment of time-bound tasks, as well as activities that are planned on a weekly basis.

The browser extension shows the current week in the color red. Orange for the next two weeks and green for the weeks after. The past six weeks are displayed in gray.
